description.narrative: The Project will contribute to pro-poor sustainable economic growth in western Guangxi and northern Viet Nam. This will be achieved by developing an efficient, safe, and environment- friendly regional transport system to promote trade in, and through, western Guangxi and reduce trade barriers with Viet Nam.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and environment-friendly regional transport system to promote trade in, and through, western Guangxi and reduce trade barriers with Viet Nam.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Vehicle operating costs for a passenger car are reduced from CNY1.45 per vehicle-km in 2006 to CNY1.26 in 2012.

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and environment-friendly regional transport system to promote trade in, and through, western Guangxi and reduce trade barriers with Viet Nam.

title.narrative: Travel distance is reduced by 34 km from Baise to Guizhou border after the Project

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and environment-friendly regional transport system to promote trade in, and through, western Guangxi and reduce trade barriers with Viet Nam.

title.narrative: Value of small-scale crossborder trade in Jingxi county increases from CNY 380 million by 20% per annum over 5 years

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and environment-friendly regional transport system to promote trade in, and through, western Guangxi and reduce trade barriers with Viet Nam.

title.narrative: Travel time between Baise and Longlin by car reduced from 5 hours in 2006 to 2 hours.

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and environment-friendly regional transport system to promote trade in, and through, western Guangxi and reduce trade barriers with Viet Nam.

title.narrative: Administrative villages with all-weather road access increased from current 52% to 100% of the total by 2012 in the project area

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and environment-friendly regional transport system to promote trade in, and through, western Guangxi and reduce trade barriers with Viet Nam.

title.narrative: Licensed bus service becomes available to 100% of villages targeted by the project in 2012, from 54% in 2006 in the project area

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and environment-friendly regional transport system to promote trade in, and through, western Guangxi and reduce trade barriers with Viet Nam.

title.narrative: Traffic on the project corridor increased by 9% per year during 2006-2012 from a baseline of 6,439 pcu in 2006.

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and environment-friendly regional transport system to promote trade in, and through, western Guangxi and reduce trade barriers with Viet Nam.

title.narrative: Value of trade through Pingxiang, Longbang, and Yuexu increases by 15% per annum during 2010- 2012

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and environment-friendly regional transport system to promote trade in, and through, western Guangxi and reduce trade barriers with Viet Nam.
